BackLVCloseGripPulldown.name: Lever Close Grip Pulldown
BackLVCloseGripPulldown.preparation: Grasp parallel lever bars. Sit with thighs under supports.
BackLVCloseGripPulldown.execution: Pull down handles to sides of chest while leaning back slightly. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackLVCloseGripPulldown.comments: Erector Spinae can become slightly engaged when torso arches back.
BackLVCloseGripPulldown.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, brachialis, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackLVCloseGripPulldown2.name: Lever Close Grip Pulldown
BackLVCloseGripPulldown2.preparation: Grasp parallel lever bars. Sit with thighs under supports.
BackLVCloseGripPulldown2.execution: Pull down handles to sides of chest while leaning back slightly. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackLVCloseGripPulldown2.comments: Erector Spinae can become slightly engaged when torso arches back.
BackLVCloseGripPulldown2.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, brachialis, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackLVFrontPulldown.name: Lever Front Pulldown
BackLVFrontPulldown.preparation: Grasp lever handles. Sit with thighs under supports.
BackLVFrontPulldown.execution: Pull down lever to upper chest. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackLVFrontPulldown.synergists: infraspinatus, rhomboids, levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, bicepsbrachii, deltoidposterior, brachialis, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, teresminor

BackLVIronCross.name: Lever Iron Cross
BackLVIronCross.preparation: Stand on platform and grasp handles to sides with palms down grip.
BackLVIronCross.execution: With arms straight, pull lever handles down below hips. Return lever handles upward just above shoulder high, or just before slight pressure in shoulder is felt. Repeat.
BackLVIronCross.comments: Platform should be adjusted so shoulder joint and girdle are approximate height as lever fulcrum. Also See Bentover Fly on Iron Cross Machine.
BackLVIronCross.synergists: pectoralisminor, teresmajor, levatorscapulae, trapeziuslower, pectoralissternal, rhomboids

BackLVPulldown.name: Lever Pulldown
BackLVPulldown.preparation: Sit on seat. Reach up and grasp handles with wide overhand grip.
BackLVPulldown.execution: Pull levers down to sides of shoulders. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackLVPulldown.comments: Range of motion will be compromised if grip is too wide. See Lever Pulldown performed on alternative apparatus. Also see exercise with parallel grip.
BackLVPulldown.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, bicepsbrachii, brachialis, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackLVPulldown2.name: Lever Pulldown
BackLVPulldown2.preparation: Sit on seat. Reach up and grasp handles with overhand grip.
BackLVPulldown2.execution: Pull levers down to sides of shoulders. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackLVPulldown2.comments: Also see Lever Pulldown performed on alternative apparatus.
BackLVPulldown2.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, bicepsbrachii, brachialis, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackLVPulldownParallelGrip.name: Lever Pulldown (parallel grip)
BackLVPulldownParallelGrip.preparation: Sit on seat. Reach up and grasp parallel handles.
BackLVPulldownParallelGrip.execution: Pull levers down to sides of shoulders. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackLVPulldownParallelGrip.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, bicepsbrachii, brachialis, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackLVPullover.name: Lever Pullover
BackLVPullover.preparation: Adjust seat height so lever is near shoulder axis. Sit on machine and push foot lever. Place elbows on pads and grasp bar from behind. Release foot lever and place feet on platform or to sides.
BackLVPullover.execution: Pull lever forward and down until elbows are to sides. Return until shoulders are fully flexed, or upper arms are parallel to torso. Repeat.
BackLVPullover.comments: When finished, push foot lever before releasing arm from lever. Release foot lever after releasing arm from lever. Actual range of motion is dependent upon individual shoulder flexibility.
BackLVPullover.synergists: pectoralisminor, deltoidposterior, teresmajor, tricepsbrachii, levatorscapulae, pectoralissternal, rhomboids

BackLVUnderhandPulldownS.name: Lever Underhand Pulldown
BackLVUnderhandPulldownS.preparation: Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Sit with thighs under supports.
BackLVUnderhandPulldownS.execution: Pull down lever handles to sides until elbows are to sides. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackLVUnderhandPulldownS.comments: See pad kick down on Hammer Machine. Also see exercise on alternative machine.
BackLVUnderhandPulldownS.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, brachialis, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackLVUnderhandPulldown.name: Lever Underhand Pulldown
BackLVUnderhandPulldown.preparation: Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Sit with thighs under supports.
BackLVUnderhandPulldown.execution: Pull down lever handles to upper chest until elbows are to sides. Return until arms and shoulders are fully extended. Repeat.
BackLVUnderhandPulldown.comments: Also see exercise on alternative machine.
BackLVUnderhandPulldown.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, brachialis, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids

BackLVAltUnderhandPulldownS.name: Lever Alternating Underhand Pulldown
BackLVAltUnderhandPulldownS.preparation: Grasp lever handles with underhand grip. Sit with thighs under supports.
BackLVAltUnderhandPulldownS.execution: Pull down one lever handle to side until elbow is down to side. Return until arm and shoulder are fully extended. Repeat with opposite arm. Continue to alternate pulldown between arms.
BackLVAltUnderhandPulldownS.comments: See pad kick down on Hammer Machine.
BackLVAltUnderhandPulldownS.synergists: levatorscapulae, brachioradialis, pectoralissternal, brachialis, deltoidposterior, trapeziusmiddle, teresmajor, trapeziuslower, pectoralisminor, rhomboids
